C

cborConverter - Class in SecureClient.SecureClient
This class is used for encoding some data as CBOR and vice versa.
cborConverter() - Constructor for class SecureClient.SecureClient.cborConverter
 
ClientBuilder - Class in SecureClient.SecureClient
This class provides all the methods for the client to perform various operations in the HCAP protocol.
ClientBuilder(String) - Constructor for class SecureClient.SecureClient.ClientBuilder
This is the Client Builder constructor, it reads the properties file and initializes the variables used in the class.
convertFromCBOR(byte[]) - Method in class SecureClient.SecureClient.cborConverter
This methods decodes CBOR byte to a map.
convertFromJSON(byte[]) - Method in class SecureClient.SecureClient.jsonConverter
This methods decodes JSON byte to a map.
convertToCBOR(HashMap<String, Object>) - Method in class SecureClient.SecureClient.cborConverter
This method encodes a map as CBOR byte array.
convertToJSON(HashMap<String, Object>) - Method in class SecureClient.SecureClient.jsonConverter
This method encodes a map as JSON byte array.
createRequestPayload(HashMap<String, Object>, byte[]) - Method in class SecureClient.SecureClient.ClientBuilder
This methed is used to create the payload which is to be put in a request.
